summary: A retired US black ops agent gets Alzheimer's, while other ex agents are being killed. He has incriminating data on a presidential candidate.
cast: Patrick Stewart|Kimberly Williams-Paisley|Hector Elizondo|Joy Kilpatrick|Craig Shoemaker|James Harlow|Richard Livingston|Julia Vera|Brenda James|Robert Lee Barry|Scott Zacky|Wayne Demaline|Hank Garrett|Holly Herbert|James Lew|Michael Waeghe
keywords: alzheimer's disease|die hard scenario|shot to death|death|hand to hand combat
title: Safe House
